name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the evening of September 23, some Hangzhou citizens went to the other side of the Asian Games Stadium to watch the fireworks at the opening ceremony, but found that fireworks were being set off in the live broadcast, but there were no fireworks in reality. Netizens jokingly called it "electronic cigarettes."
Someone in the comment area explained that the organizing committee had previously stated that in order to be green and environmentally friendly, Hangzhou would use digital special effects to present the fireworks show.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 22, a blogger said that civil servants in some areas of Nanjing were unable to receive their salaries.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 24, Zhengzhou No. 1 Middle School’s confession wall announced that because of the fruitless contact with the school, it publicly released a "letter to the school" to the public. It stated that the campus of Zhengzhou No. 1 Middle School should be democratic, not authoritarian, and hoped that the school would have a dialogue with no less than 55 elected representatives from all classes in the school to discuss the new regulations, and set up a school-wide student representative conference and a teacher representative conference to review the results of the discussion.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On September 24, a Weibo user said that he was fined and confiscated hundreds of thousands of yuan by the Shuangqiao Branch of Chengde Public Security Bureau for using GitHub to work.
According to the defense statement, the man was suspected of receiving company tasks on GitHub to write code from 2019 to 2022, answering user questions on support, and using Zoom for remote work.
The above facts meet the relevant penalty regulations, so a fine of 200 yuan was imposed and 1,058,000 yuan of illegal income was confiscated.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A programmer worked for an overseas software company in China, and his salary was classified as "illegal income" by the public security bureau and confiscated. The demonstration effect of this case will have a huge impact.

content:
On September 24, it was reported that the Asian Games e-sports events that many players were looking forward to would not be broadcast live, which triggered widespread discussion among players.
Subsequently, the topic of "Asian Games e-sports suspected of not being broadcast live" was banned.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 24, NetEase's game "Identity V" announced that due to the upgraded control of the Asian Games, the offline event originally scheduled to start on September 29 was temporarily suspended and cancelled.

name: 李老师不是你老师

Netizen contribution
In Zhangye, Gansu, the municipal government began to charge 3 yuan per cubic meter for rural tap water, which was originally free.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 20, a student from Luofu Middle School in Yongjia County, Wenzhou City, Zhejiang Province was suspended from classes by his teacher for using a mobile phone in violation of school rules. During the suspension period, the student jumped from a building at home.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
As for the cause of the child's death, both parties have their own opinions.
The family said that the child begged the teacher not to listen to the class, but the teacher ignored it and eventually caused the child to have a mental breakdown.
The account suspected to be the teacher said that the child had depression and had shown his wounds from domestic violence at school. He was also not allowed to use mobile phones at home and was beaten if he used a mobile phone.
